mapper.select: select term_id,pair_id,industry_id,term,update_time from dict_term order by pair_id,industry_id asc
select term_id,pair_id,industry_id,term,update_time from dict_term where pair_id = #{0} AND industry_id = #{1} AND update_time > #{2} order by pair_id,industry_id asc

SELECT dt.term_id,dt.pair_id,dt.industry_id,dt.term,dt.update_time FROM dict_term dt INNER JOIN dict_term_details dtd ON dtd.term_id = dt.term_id AND dt.pair_id = #{0} AND dtd.update_time > #{1} ORDER BY dt.pair_id,dt.industry_id ASC
